pr_title: [BEAM-9980] do not use hardcoded python versions in validate container dataflow jobs

timeline.message: [BEAM-9980] do not use hardcoded python versions in validate container dataflow jobs

timeline.bodyText:
Let's spell out the versions and if possible assign LOWEST_SUPPORTED=ALL_SUPPORTED_VERSIONS[0],
HIGHEST_SUPPORTED=ALL_SUPPORTED_VERSIONS[-1]
(I'm not sure of the exact syntax).
timeline.author: tvalentyn

timeline.bodyText: nit: s/VALIDATE_CONTAINER_DATAFLOW_PYTHON_VERSIONS/VALIDATES_CONTAINER_DATAFLOW_PYTHON_VERSIONS/ for consistency with current naming elsewhere.
timeline.author: tvalentyn
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -19,6 +19,8 @@
 import CommonJobProperties as commonJobProperties
 import PostcommitJobBuilder

timeline.message: fixup: renamed constants, VALIDATE to VALIDATES
